name: EscapeRoute
description: The robots are in control , things are so tight you think you can’t even breath without letting them know. You decide to not be part of this and then it happens …..
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: Windows 7 , Windows 8 , Windows 10 , 64 bit version 处理器: Dual core at 1.5 Ghz 内存: 2 GB RAM 图形: 1 GB of VRAM DirectX 版本: 11 存储空间: 需要 4 GB 可用空间
